summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Forty-sixth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Fifteenth Avenue Northwest to Seventeenth Avenue Northwest main sewer, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1503 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
